QuestData.Title: Squirmy Delight
QuestData.Description: The hidden master may have to wait. Look at these people, $p.$b$BThey are so THIN! They must be starving.$b$BYou know what we need? A big steaming bowl of Squirmy Delight.$b$BIf you find yourself near a river, try rounding up some intact skitterer glands and I'll cook up a batch.
QuestData.CompletionText: Mama Bramblestaff always said Squirmy Delight will cure any hunger one way or another.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha! With this I can make a stew potent enough to knock these waifish elves on their feet.
